Text: Thank you. It's nice to have some more information and materials on learning Czech. There is very little.
Thank you for this upload.If you have more resources on learning Czech,Hungarian and Serbo-Croatian,please upload them.

Yes!!
Not only the basics in audio but also in the PDF!
Now I can connect the strange letters with the sounds.

Thank you so much for uploading, cause I would not have had the time to even buy this before flying to Prague.

Thank you sooo much!! Both 123dutch as well as the seeders.
